briefTitle: Prospective PRO/QoL Registry for Patients With Bone Metastases of Breast or Prostate Cancer
officialTitle: Open-labeled, Multicenter, Non-interventional Prospective PRO/QoL Registry for Patients With Osteoprotective Treatment for Bone Metastases of Breast or Prostate Cancer
conditions: Breast Cancer, Prostate Cancer, Bone Metastases
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Patient Reported Outcomes (PRO) regarding bone pain and the impact of bone pain on quality of life and daily activities in patients with bone metastases treated with osteoprotective agents.
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Histologically confirmed metastatic breast or prostate cancer
* Start of first systemic osteoprotective treatment
* Ability to read and understand German
* Written informed consent

Exclusion Criteria:

• None
